summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Masal Sepeti (Story Basket) Turkish fairy tale application. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. AI story generation (critical feature) working excellently. Frontend mostly functional with minor dropdown interaction issue in story creation form.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable in automated testing environment
ui_bugs.details: Form loads correctly and dropdowns open, but options are not clickable. Backend API works perfectly when called directly. Appears to be UI component interaction issue.

passed_tests: Get Topics (GET /api/topics) - All 6 topics returned correctly
Get Stories (GET /api/stories) - Working with filtering and search
AI Story Generation (POST /api/stories/generate) - CRITICAL TEST PASSED
Topic cards display (6 cards loaded correctly)
Story detail page with full audio player functionality
Audio controls (play/pause, restart, mute, volume, speed)
Stories list page with search and filtering UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown interaction issue in story creation form - Select component options are not clickable. Consider using different UI library or fixing event handling for Select components.
